Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor and the Submarine Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Duke O'Dowd, aka the Human Meteor, and Namor in an intertwined story involving waterfront intrigue, G-Men chases, and a Japanese submarine plot.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic title, main character (Human Meteor), and setting (underwater) on the cover page.

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ride and Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Duke picks up playboys, encounters waterfront restrictions, and becomes suspicious of being followed.

sub_scenes.title: Chase and Transformation
sub_scenes.description: G-Men chase Duke, leading to his transformation into the Human Meteor.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor vs. G-Men and Police Praise
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts the G-Men, followed by police officers praising his actions.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Suspicion and Stowaway Plan
sub_scenes.description: A G-Man in hospital reveals suspicions, while Duke plans a stowaway operation with Toby.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Danger
sub_scenes.description: Toby investigates the yacht, discovers a depth chart, gets pushed overboard, but returns to find a submarine.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of the Marked Depth Chart
Reporting to the Captain and Recognition

sub_scenes.title: Namor's Underwater Action
sub_scenes.description: Namor dives from the yacht based on Toby's info and discovers a sunken Japanese submarine and torpedo operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor's Urgent Dive and Submarine Discovery
Underwater Torpedo Operation and Namor's Realization

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation and Ship Attack
sub_scenes.description: Namor confronts divers, is attacked, recognizes a diver, and then attacks the ship after a chaotic ascent.

narrative_arcs.title: Targeting the Submarine with a Torpedo
Ship Crew Reacts to Peter's Fate and Geyser

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Namor boards the yacht, searches for the depth map, exposes Peter, escapes with Toby and Duke, and Toby recovers in the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Namor Reaches the Yacht and Confronts the Crew
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin
Presenting the Depth Map to the Captain

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Nazi Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: The Liberty Lads become involved in uncovering a Nazi spy ring operating out of a bus company, leading to action and resolution with Major Bronson.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends
sub_scenes.description: Liberty Lads are shown fighting Nazi-like antagonists in a dynamic action scene.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Mystery
sub_scenes.description: Skip and Chuck observe an ambulance arriving at a neighbor's house, sparking their curiosity.

sub_scenes.title: Dropped Wallet and Bus Company Clue
sub_scenes.description: An intern drops a wallet, which Skip and Chuck find, leading them to a bus company address.

narrative_arcs.title: Boys Attempt to Return Dropped Wallet
Discovery of the Wallet and Bus Company Address

sub_scenes.title: Garage Encounter and Major Bronson
sub_scenes.description: At the bus company garage, the boys witness a Marine saluting a civilian, who is identified as Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salute and Major Bronson's Identity
Explanation of Major Bronson's Civilian Clothes

sub_scenes.title: Bus Company and Horst's Trap
sub_scenes.description: Boys return the wallet to the bus company and are led into a trap by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Returning the Wallet to the Bus Company
Mr. Horst's Abrupt Arrival and Confrontation
Close-up of Mr. Horst's Menacing Face

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Bronson's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Boys are interrogated, threatened, but Major Bronson intervenes to propose a 'quieter' plan.

sub_scenes.title: Carbon Monoxide Plot and Barracks Fight
sub_scenes.description: Bronson reveals the carbon monoxide plot, but a fight breaks out and Bronson is betrayed by his men.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Spy Ring Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Boys seek help, discover sabotage plans at the waterfront, and marines arrive at the barracks to fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Major's Injury and Urgent Medical Aid

sub_scenes.title: Flashback and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Flashback to the threat against Bronson, followed by resolution and recognition of victory over the Nazi spy ring.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Rescue of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: The Champ and Henry get entangled in a South American adventure, tasked with rescuing Rosita from El Tigre and Axis powers.

sub_scenes.title: Desert Flashback and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Flashback to a desert fight, then setting the scene in a sleepy South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Establishment of a South American Town Setting

sub_scenes.title: Hotel Room Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Army officers invade The Champ and Henry's hotel room, leading to a standoff and abrupt departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Hotel Room Standoff and Abrupt Departure

sub_scenes.title: Kidnapping Revelation and Consul Visit
sub_scenes.description: Revelation of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre, prompting The Champ and Henry to seek help from the American Consul.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Forced Car Ride
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's Axis connection and ransom demands are revealed as The Champ and Henry are forced into a car.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Ransom and Axis Connection
Arrival at the House and Introduction to 'Mama'

sub_scenes.title: Mama's Plea for Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Mama reveals Rosita is her granddaughter and pleads for The Champ and Henry's help in her rescue.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and El Tigre Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Plan to infiltrate El Tigre's hideout, distraction of guards, and dramatic self-revelation of El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Rosita Search
sub_scenes.description: Confrontation with El Tigre's men, internal monologue, and search for Rosita, revealing Axis agent involvement.

sub_scenes.title: Tigre's Resolve and Rescue Mission
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's imprisonment by Axis agents reaches Tigre, who immediately orders a rescue mission.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Operation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Horseback chase, forced entry, rear entrance plan, gymnastic climb, Rosita's rescue, and continued combat, leading to a sergeant promotion and reassurance.

narrative_arcs.title: Execution of the Rear Entrance Plan
Machine Gun Threat and Champ's Intervention

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan and the Submarine Plans
Major_Arcs.description: Devil Dog Dolan faces jungle combat, capture, and shipboard punishment in a mission related to submarine detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Flashback to Devil Dog Dolan in intense jungle combat, showcasing his fighting skills.

narrative_arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Action: Jungle Combat

sub_scenes.title: Father's Bargain and Dolan's Mission
sub_scenes.description: Captain Lawton reveals his son's capture and a bargain for submarine detector plans, tasking Dolan with a mission.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan infiltrates the jungle, is observed, feels unease, and gets ambushed by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Coerced Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, interrogated, tortured, and coerced into handing over the submarine plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson and Jungle Fight
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, sets fire, and then fights natives in the jungle.

sub_scenes.title: Post-Conflict Understanding and New Objective
sub_scenes.description: Natives explain their betrayal and desire friendship, leading to a new 'skunk chase' objective for Dolan.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Orders and Brawl
sub_scenes.description: Captain orders surrender, but finds Dolan in a brawl, which Dolan wins, even punching an officer.

sub_scenes.title: Punishment and Lesson Learned
sub_scenes.description: Dolan faces consequences for his brawl but is acknowledged for a 'great deed' and learns a service lesson during corporal punishment.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: The Twinkle Twins investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering racketeering and needing to secure blood for the suspect's daughter.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins and Urban Threat
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins in a city setting, highlighting the threat of 'ruthless killers'.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and the Threat

sub_scenes.title: Newspaper Office Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Elijah assigns Dan and Diane to investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess.

sub_scenes.title: Suspect Information and Police HQ Visit
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of suspect Tom Reilly and Dan and Diane gather information from police headquarters.

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Sick Child
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane visit the hospital to find Reilly's sick child, hoping for leads.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with the Nurse and Revelation of Sick Girl

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Blood Type Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Suspicion of Barnacci's racketeering arises, and the critical need for Farnacci's blood for Reilly's daughter is revealed.

narrative_arcs.title: Reilly's Daughter and the Need for Farnacci's Blood

sub_scenes.title: Phone Call to Elijah and Newspaper Clue
sub_scenes.description: Dan calls Elijah for investigation, and a newspaper reveals key connections, leading to the Irish section search.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Search in the Irish section proves initially fruitless, but leads to an encounter with Mrs. Murphy and vital information.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Irish Section and Reilly Pursuit
Unfruitful Search for Reilly in Irish Section
Encounter with Mrs. Murphy and Revelation of Reilly's Daughter's Plight

sub_scenes.title: Gunman Attack and Community Chase
sub_scenes.description: Gunman attacks Mrs. Murphy's house, Dan pursues, and the community blocks the gunman's escape leading to a brawl.

narrative_arcs.title: Dan Intervenes and Confronts Gunman on Car Roof
Police Arrival and Apprehension of Criminals

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath, Hospital Wait, and Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: Police escort criminals, injured are rushed to hospital, anxious wait for news, and blood donation efforts begin.

narrative_arcs.title: Awaiting News and Doctor's Diagnosis at the Hospital
Blood Donation Offer and Compatibility Issue
Urgent Call for Blood and Community Mobilization at Hospital
Blood Type Confirmation and Donor Preparation
The Life-Saving Transfusion and Immediate Revival
Post-Transfusion Observation and Anticipation of Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Capture and Birthday Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Plan to capture Farnacci, police arrest him at a poolroom, and a birthday party celebrates Reilly's daughter's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Farnacci's Capture and Police Pursuit
Forced Blood Donation and Birthday Celebration for Recovery
